item.title: By: riverguy
item.dc:creator: riverguy
item.content:encoded:
Actually, you just reminded me that I need to start using Office 2007. Excel especially.

If you’re looking for an Access alternative that is quick to set up, then you might want to check out InfoPath. I haven’t used it, but a post at a forum the other day got me a little interested in it.

http://office.microsoft.com/en-us/infopath/HA101635771033.aspx#2
